TAKING INVENTORY: WATER BOTTLEA refreshing read, guaranteed!背包盘点：水瓶保证这是一个小清新的阅读

*Glug glug glug* Ahhh... After a hard day’s mining, with the stone dust getting into your mouth, and your throat sore from screaming every time you think you spot a skeleton, there’s nothing like kicking back with Minecraft’s most refreshing item – the water bottle.哈哈，辛苦的采了一天矿回来之后，嘴里都是石头灰，每次看到看到骷髅都会喊破喉咙，这个时候没有什么比我的世界里让人耳目一新的东西——水瓶更让心放松的了。
Water bottles were added in version 1.0.0 of Minecraft, released in November 2011, at the same time as the potion brewing system. Which is no coincidence, because water bottles are a key first step for every potion in the game. In fact, that’s pretty much all they’re useful for, though they do make a nice sign for a potion shop if you put them in an item frame.在2011年11月发布的我的世界1.0.0版本中就添加了水瓶，与酿造台同时发布，这其实并不是巧合，因为水瓶是炼药的关键一步，事实上，这是它们的很大一部分用处了，尽管他们可以放在牌子上作为一个很好的商店标志。





006At2iyly1g1bvp2tyk5j30ks0bp75l.jpg (51.68 KB, 下载次数: 19)

下载附件

2019-3-25 14:17 上传





It’s easy to make a water bottle – just arrange three blocks of glass in a crafting grid to make a glass bottle, and then right-click on some water or a cauldron to fill it up. If you pick the latter, perhaps because you’re in the Nether and there’s no water around, filling a bottle will remove a third of the cauldron’s contents in one go. That seems like way more than should fit in the bottle – I guess the rest spills over the sides?制作一个水瓶很容易——只要在一个合成台里排列三个玻璃就可以制作成玻璃瓶，然后右键水或者用炼药锅来补充水。如果你选择了炼药锅，也许是因为你在地狱里，那里并没有任何水。用一个玻璃瓶里就可以装走1/3炼药锅里的液体，这看起来比装载玻璃瓶里的量要大的很多——我想玻璃瓶里的液体都溢出来了把！





006At2iyly1g1bvthgyyzj307103kmxd.jpg (5.11 KB, 下载次数: 19)

下载附件

2019-3-25 14:18 上传






Your other option for getting a water bottle, if for some reason you really hate crafting (and if that’s the case then perhaps this isn’t the game for you), is to fish one up. With an unenchanted fishing rod, you’ve got a 1.2 percent chance of landing a bottle full of water, which is one in every 83-ish casts. Good luck!如果你不喜欢自己手工制作（如果是这样，那么这款游戏可能不适合你玩耍），你的另一个选择就是去钓一个水瓶。用一根没有附魔的钓竿，你又1.2%的几率钓到一个水瓶，平均83次就会出现一个，祝你好运。
Water bottles are pretty popular in the real world. Actually, that’s a bit of an understatement – more than 480 *billion* plastic drinking bottles were sold in 2016 across the globe, up from about 300 billion a decade ago. If placed end to end, they would extend more than halfway to the Sun – which is a very, very long way away. In space, no-one can hear you sip.水瓶在现实生活中也很受欢迎，事实上，这有点轻描淡写了——2016年全球塑料饮料瓶超过4800亿瓶被出售，而十年前仅仅有3000亿瓶被出售，如果把她们串联起来，它们会延伸地球到太阳距离的一半——这是一个非常、非常长的距离。在太空中，没有任何能听到你的喝水声。





006At2iyly1g1bvp2vg5ej30ks0bpmzt.jpg (76.75 KB, 下载次数: 19)

下载附件

2019-3-25 14:18 上传





Once drunk, most of these bottles are thrown away, despite the plastic used to make them being very easy to recycle. Most end up in a landfill or in the ocean, where they’ll stay for centuries, possibly millennia. According to scientists who study plastic waste, by 2050 the ocean will contain more plastic by weight than fish.这些水瓶一旦喝完了，就会被丢掉，尽管用塑料制成的很容易回收，但是他们中的大多数最终都会丢弃在垃圾场或海洋中，在那里，他们会存在数百年，甚至数千年，据科学研究表明，到2050年，大海中的塑料重量将超过鱼类的重量。
So next time you finish a drink, keep hold of the plastic bottle and use it again. And again. And again. And then a few more times for good measure. And then recycle it properly so it can be made into lots more bottles for the future. Otherwise, in a few decades time, sentient plastic bottles will most likely take over the planet as the only remaining species. I, for one, welcome our plasticky overlords.所以当你下一次喝完一杯饮料的时候，可以将塑料瓶反复使用，多使用几次，然后对它们进行合理的回收，这样它就可以被制作成更多的瓶子，以备将来使用。否则，在几十年的时间里，有意识的塑料瓶可能很快成为地球上仅存的物种。就我而言，我欢迎我们的塑料霸主。
